name: Isolation and Disconnection
Safely isolate and lock out all circuits being worked on
Removal of existing lighting where required
Removal of existing power where required
Check existing cabling for compliance
Remove all redundnant and non compliant cabling
Containment - Conduits
Coordinate set out of all conduits with impact and other services
Installation of all conduit
1st Fix
Cabling installed as per lghting and power locations reflected
Correct size power/lighting cable installed as per cable calc to loads and voltage drop
Markout nogs for flush boxes and surface/suspended lighting
Flush boxes mounted as per architectural elevation
RFIS to set out and location are confirmed
Flush boxes for isolators installed above bench or at accessiable location to appliance
Feed and switch wires installed and confirmed for lighting
Hotwater cable installed and location confirmed with plumber
Appliance isolators installed a/b or at accessible location
LCP flush box mounted and switch control wires installed between LCP and DB control
Lighting loops installed as per lighting layout
Switch locations confirmed and is accessiable upon entry to room
Emergency circuits and loops checked and completed.
Lighting and power circuits confirmed and all loops are checked and confirmed
Bond cable to ceiling grid/sinks and structure is ran and confirmed
All  cables are cable tied neatly on catenary wires and meets specification
Floorboxes marked and penetrations complete
2nd Fix
Light switches installed, levelled, labelled and live
Power outlets installed, levelled, labelled and live
Data outlets installed, levelled, labelled and tested
Surface sockets fitted off for pan fittings, downlights and emergency lights
Surface sockets are labelled to allocated circuits correctly
Pan fittings, downlights and emergency lights are installed in  correct locations.
LCP panel is fitted off and lights are switching correctly
Emergency lights  installed, labelled, live and working correctly
Trunking installed plummbed and level to mounting block for outlets where required
Ceiling grid/sinks/building structure is bonded and test results < 0.5 ohms to DB
Feature lights installed securly suspended or surface mount onto ply behind ceiling grid
Commissioning - Distribution Board
Switchboard test sheet completed and added to dropbox
DB schedule completed, installed into db and added to dropbox
Distribution Board test sheet completed and added to dropbox
Subcircuit commissioning results sheet completed and added to dropbox
Distribution board check sheet completed and added to dropbox
Earthing test sheet completed and added to dropbox
Emergency lighting test sheet completed and added to dropbox
Timeclock test sheet completed and added to dropbox
Board free from debri, no marks, all accessories installed
Labelling completed on all field outlets, switches and isolators etc
Emergency lighting test sheet completed and added to dropbox
Subcircuit commissioning results sheet completed and added to dropbox
